data.message: Just received a message from a Tucker Alicia Nichole saying I won $500k dollars. I was randomly selected. I was contacted through messenger and she would not give me any corporate or company info to confirm but she wanted my Driver license number and my address,email etc, all but my Social Security number.

replies.message: Thanks for checking in with us, Jennifer. This sounds like a hoax campaign. Be sure not to release any personal or financial information to the sender. When you see stuff like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: on.fb.me/13fEkz5. -Rhea
Facebook More than a hoax. It may be a dangerous scam.

Tucker Alicia Nichole --- watch out for her. Her profile says she works for Facebook. And when I reported her profile Facebook says that she doesn't violate their community standards??? I even sent them screenshots of the covo
